'''Martial Artist's Feather Accessory''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Martial Artist]].

==Description==
A feather plucked from a bird soaring in the sky by a skillful martial artist.<br>The essence of martial arts is not necessarily about the power of attacks.<br>The condescending evil stole his love's joy,<br>Agility and nimbleness honed over years of training are just as prideworthy for a martial artist.<br>The martial artist will wear the feather on his chest as proof of his unparalleled skills.
